name: Blue Wave Round Liner Pad for Above-Ground Pools, 24'

reviews.name: Blue Wave Round Liner Pad for Above-Ground Pools, 24'
reviews.reviewText: this pad is much like a felt cloth. it does a good job of protecting the bottom of the pool liner. it is heavy and is stitched well in the joining points. we think it is a good pad to use under liner and on top of sand.
reviews.title: tough protection

reviews.name: Blue Wave Round Liner Pad for Above-Ground Pools, 24'
reviews.reviewText: If I wouldn't have purchased this produce I would have had a hole in my liner. Of course I didn't use the right sand so the liner was a must. If you are not going to use the right sand or can't find the right sand you will definitely need this liner.
reviews.title: Was worth the money

reviews.name: Blue Wave Round Liner Pad for Above-Ground Pools, 24'
reviews.reviewText: We had an Intex metal frame that weeds would grow through the liner even though we sprayed the area and used the included tarp with the pool. We bought a new Intex ultra frame at the beginning of the summer. This liner pad is keeping the weeds from growing through. It's very thin, but it's doing the job. It's worth the extra money & time to get this & set it up before setting up the pool.
reviews.title: Holding up well - keeping weeds out
